translations.text: (O Prophet), Did We not lay open your breast<sup foot_note="182765">1</sup>
and relieve you of the burden
that had well-nigh broken your back?<sup foot_note="182766">1</sup>
And did We not exalt your fame?<sup foot_note="182767">1</sup>
Indeed, there is ease with hardship.
Most certainly, there is ease with hardship.<sup foot_note="182768">1</sup>
So, whenever you are free, strive in devotion,
and turn to your Lord with longing.<sup foot_note="182769">1</sup>
